actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of the Joint Committee print entitled "Industrial Policy Movement in the United States: Is It the Answer?"

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of additional copies of the joint committee print entitled "Industrial Policy Movement in the United States: Is it the Answer?" for the use of the Joint Economic Committee.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of the Joint Committee print entitled "Industrial Policy Movement in the United States: Is It the Answer?"
